霵字的基本解释

霵
jí
雨下。
暴雨貌。

霵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》阻立切，入緝，莊。］
［《廣韻》仕戢切，入緝，崇。］
(1)雨下貌。借指雨声。
(2)见“霵”。

霵字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霵； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1378第29
【廣韻】阻立切，音戢。【玉篇】本作?。【類篇】本作?。詳後?字註。　又【王褒·洞簫賦】㘊霵曄踕。【註】衆聲疾貌。【釋文】霵，助急切。　又【集韻】七入切，音緝。本作?。詳後?字註。　又【廣韻】仕戢切，音䯂。暴雨貌。

霵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
霵字的起名意思

暂无。

Gai
jí
It's raining.
Rainstorm appearance.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" obstructs Liqie, enters the arrest, Zhuang. ]
["Guang Yun" official rank cut, enter the seizure, Chong. ]
(1) The appearance of rain. By referring to the sound of rain.
(2) See "霵".

[Guang Yun] Stop standing and cutting, sound squad. [Jade articles] This work?. 【Classes】This work?. After the details? Note.　[Wang Bao·Dongxiao Fu] 㘊霵晔踕. [Note] All voices are ill-looking. 【Explanation】Kai, help eagerly.　[Jiyun] Seven cuts, sound. This work?. After the details? Note.　[Guang Yun] Officially cut, with sound. Rainstorm appearance.
